description: Update a public praise culture value
permissions: Allowed if the user is permitted to update the related public praise (delegated to PublicPraisePolicy#update?).
side_effects: Updates the public praise culture value link relationships.
validation_notes: The public praise culture value ID argument is required. At least one of --public-praise or --culture-value must be provided. Provided relationship IDs cannot be empty. The public praise and culture value must belong to the same organization.
